name: Bird Spotter's Travels
description:
Bird Spotter's Travels: Made in 3 days for Mini Jam 99: Birds

(Limitation: Can't Stop Moving)

It would be highly appreciated if you could rate and leave feedback after playing. A Relaxing game about using your little polaroid camera to take pictures of wild birds.  Keep moving to charge up your Camera! Use fancy filters to create lovely photos of the little critters around the hillside. Controls:

- TAB for menu

- WASD to Move

- QE to change Filters

- Mouse 1 & 2 for Camera and scrollwheel for zoom!

Exported Images are in "Bird Spotters Travels\Bird Spotter's Travels_Data\Images"

Changelog:

- Fixed BirdType: Dove having a double reference in the Bird Discovery Journal

Known Issues:

* The first image taken might not register. Fixed after taking a 2nd one.

* User Interface starts enabled, but requires 2 button presses to close instead of one.

Credits:

- Markus Franz > Programming

- PizzaLacroy > Art

- Alberto Rodriquez > Music
